[Clip Request] Kyle Lowry kicks Sekou Doumbouya in the face
Sekou Doumbouya in his second year is now the longest tenured Piston
Sekou Doumbouya is the only player on the Pistons who was also on last year's team
[Highlight] Killian Hayes throws an absolute dime to Sekou Doumbouya
Sekou Doumbouya is the only player on the Pistons who was also on last year's team
[Highlight] Killian Hayes threads the needle with a ridiculous pass to Sekou Doumbouya

Sekou Doumbouya on being the longest-tenured member of the Pistons: “It feels special, but at the same time, you’re like, what’s next? I don’t know what’s going on… I’m still with the Detroit Pistons… whatever happens happens… it’s a business.”

[Fedor] Keep an eye on Detroit and Memphis. Sources say Grizzlies small forwards Dillon Brooks and Kyle Anderson are available for the right price. The Pistons are expected to look at dumping either Jahlil Okafor or 2019 No. 15 pick Sekou Doumbouya.

[Wojnarowski] ESPN Sources: Brooklyn is trading C DeAndre Jordan, four future-second round picks and $5.78M to Detroit for Jahlil Okafor and Sekou Doumbouya. Pistons plan to work through a buyout on two-years, $20M owed Jordan; Nets will save $47M in salary and tax on deal.

Pistons coach Dwayne Casey on Sekou Doumbouya: "I don't know if it’s a culture barrier, maybe, but he's gotta continue to play hard, play with passion... He's gotten the opportunities so far. You're gonna make mistakes as a young player, but a lack of intensity shouldn't be one of them.”

[Wojnarowski] ESPN Sources: Brooklyn is trading C DeAndre Jordan, four future-second round picks and $5.78M to Detroit for Jahlil Okafor and Sekou Doumbouya. Pistons plan to work through a buyout on two-years, $20M owed Jordan; Nets will save $47M in salary and tax on deal.
Pretty insane that Sekou Doumbouya is currently the longest tenured Piston
Jake Fischer on Sekou Doumbouya: "There is a rumor circling the league that, just like Thon Maker, Sekou is older than his listed age."

Will Sekou Doumbouya be waived by the end of the season?

[Wojnarowski] Brooklyn is trading C DeAndre Jordan, four future-second round picks and $5.78M to Detroit for Jahlil Okafor and Sekou Doumbouya. Pistons plan to work through a buyout on two-years, $20M owed Jordan; Nets will save $47M in salary and tax on deal.

[MacMahon] Rockets intend to waive Sekou Doumbouya after acquiring him along with a second-round pick in a trade with the Nets, sources tell ESPN. Rockets sent Nets $110,000. The pick is unprotected in 2024.
[Charania] The Brooklyn Nets are trading forward Sekou Doumbouya and a second-round pick to the Houston Rockets, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.

[Tim MacMahon] Rockets intend to waive Sekou Doumbouya after acquiring him along with a second-round pick in a trade with the Nets, sources tell ESPN. Rockets sent Nets $110,000. The pick is unprotected in 2024.

[Lakers] Sekou Doumbouya is joining the Lakers on a two-way contract
[Shams Charania] The Brooklyn Nets are trading forward Sekou Doumbouya and a second-round pick to the Houston Rockets, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
[Charania] The Lakers are progressing toward a two-way deal with free agent forward Sekou Doumbouya, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium. Doumbouya was the No. 15 pick in the 2019 NBA Draft.
[Smith] Sekou Doumbouya cleared waivers today and is now an unrestricted free agent.
Sekou Doumbouya with 10pts, 3 rebs, 2 stls in garbage time for the Lakers.

[Trudell] LAL have only 10 players available tonight, including 2-way player Sekou Doumbouya. Starters: Westbrook, Bradley, Bazemore, AD and Jordan. Subs: Carmelo, Ellington, Monk, Doumbouya and Howard. LAL are especially short at PG. When Russ isn’t on the floor, it’ll be by committee.

[Charania] The Lakers are waiving Sekou Doumbouya and signing forward Chaundee Brown of NBA G League South Bay on a two-way contract. Doumbouya is currently rehabbing a foot injury, and with a banged-up roster, the Lakers are adding a healthy body.
Sekou Doumbouya looks promising in Lakers debut I 10 PTS 4 REBS 2 STLS I LAKERS VS BLAZERS
[Mile Trudell] The Lakers are signing Chaundee Brown to a 2-way contract with the @SouthBayLakers, and waiving Sekou Doumbouya.
